message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product that I believe will be a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14500.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the product, $14500 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying right now. I'm willing to pay $12000 for it. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your interest and offer, Bob. Considering the value of the product, I can lower the price to $13500. I hope this works for you.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $13500 is still a little too high for me. I'm willing to pay $13000. This is my final offer.
